contribute(uint256).details: Contribute to the reward of a random number. All the ETH will be lost forever.

params._block: Block the random number is linked to.

getRN(uint256).details: Get the "random number", which is predictable.

params._block: Block the random number is linked to.

returns.RN: Random Number. If the number is not ready or has not been required 0 instead.

getUncorrelatedRN(uint256).details: Get a uncorrelated random number. Act like getRN but give a different number for each sender.      This is to prevent users from getting correlated numbers.

params._block: Block the random number is linked to.

returns.RN: Random Number. If the number is not ready or has not been required 0 instead.
